original_title: Precisamos Falar Com os Homens? Uma Jornada Pela Igualdade de Gênero
overview: #HeForShe is a movement for gender equality and women empowerment, and its aim is to engage men and boys to evolve their connection towards gender in which they do not act or feel as male chauvinists.
tagline: Do We Need to Talk to Men?
title: Do We Need to Talk to Men?
